body.name: MEETION Ergonomic Keyboard and Mouse Wireless Combo, Multi-Device Bluetooth Keyboard and Mouse with Wrist Rest, 3 DPI Adjustable Full-Sized Split Keyboard and Mouse, for PC/Computer/Laptop, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 32 mins
features: 【UNCOMPROMISING ERGONOMIC DESIGN】Director-B keyboard and mouse combo is meticulously engineered to prioritize your well-being and performance. Impeccably designed with integrated wrist rests and a contoured base, it promotes the ideal wrist and forearm positioning, effectively reducing fatigue and discomfort during prolonged work sessions.

【SEAMLESS MULTI-CHANNEL CONNECTIVITY】Empowered by a cutting-edge connectivity architecture, this combo seamlessly integrates 1x 2.4G channel and 2x Bluetooth channels. Effortlessly switch between devices – be it your computer, laptop, or Mac – to ensure uninterrupted productivity and a fluid workflow.

【ERGONOMIC VERTICAL MOUSE】Departing from the conventional, our vertical mouse reimagines precision. It combines a natural palm orientation with precision-driven functionality, diminishing hand strain while elevating your accuracy to new levels, making it the ultimate choice for intricate tasks.

【ADJUSTABLE DPI MASTERY】Tailor your cursor control to perfection with adjustable DPI settings supporting 800, 1200, and 1600. Whether you're engaged in content creation, data analysis, or design work, expect unparalleled precision.

【CONVENIENT RECHARGEABLE MANAGEMENT】Bid farewell to the hassle of frequent battery replacements. Both the keyboard and mouse boast advanced lithium-ion batteries, offering enduring power. With a 300mA battery for the keyboard and a 400mA battery for the mouse, recharging is simple, ensuring uninterrupted productivity.

【FULL-SIZE AND SPLIT KEYBOARD VERSATILITY】Enjoy the versatility of a full-size keyboard, complete with an included USB-C adapter for effortless Mac and multi-device compatibility. It seamlessly adapts to various work settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice ergonomic multi device keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I'm impressed with this keyboard and mouse combo! The multi-device bluetooth feature is allowing seamless switching between devices. The full-sized split keyboard with a wrist rest is a good added feature for extended typing sessions, providing comfort and support. The adjustable DPI on the mouse adds versatility, catering to different preferences. The sleek black design adds a touch of sophistication to my workspace. Overall, a fantastic combo for anyone seeking comfort, functionality, and a stylish addition to their PC setup.Setting up is a breeze, and the connection remains stable without any issues. I've experimented with iClever, Arteck, and Logitech multi-device keyboards, but none met my satisfaction. I specifically sought a full-sized keyboard, and Arteck's connectivity was notably poor.The only aspect I'm not particularly fond of is the very soft key press. It would be fantastic if there were some tactile response for feedback or, at the very least, a clicking sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hassle free keyboard set
reviews.reviewText: Awesome set for a fracture of price.I work a lot with data entry, so this is essential.No wires, no hassle.The Keyboard is easy on the wrists and quiet.No batteries needed, just plug it in to charge.Hassle free bt connection.Works fine with Macbook as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helped me with wrist issues
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and spend a lot of time on a keyboard and this one has helped me with some wrist issues I have been having lately. Very comfortable to use. This is the first time using a mouse like this and it is so much more comfortable to use.Only downsides are the mouse occasionally disconnects for no reason and it's a bit of a challenge to get it going again and I cannot seem to find a print screen button for taking screen shots for work. It has a button for everything else but that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mouse not charging
reviews.reviewText: Lets start with the pros. I love the color. Set up was super easy.The cons: I've had this product for 5 days and the mouse has stopped charging. I liked the feel of the mouse and the verticle design but it's not keeping its charge. I have to keep it plugged in with the provided charging cord.The keyboard set up is fine. I like the split design. My issue with the keyboard is that the delete button is small. I was previously using a keyboard that had a large delete button so im trying to get used to a small delete button.I contacted support regarding the mouse and the only solution was to return the keyboard and mouse. Too bad because I liked this set but now I'm unsure if I should get another or try a different brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good keyboard for the price
reviews.reviewText: Keys feel good, they are don’t make much noise. Easy to type and wrists don’t hurt anymore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lasted less than a month- junk
reviews.reviewText: Update - 02/10. Keyboard died. What a waste of resources.Update- 2/3/2024 I’m using my old Kensington mouse. The keyboard is working great.1/18/24I appreciate the keyboard's excellent functionality and ergonomic design; it's nearly perfect for me. However, I've noticed some glitches with the mouse. Compared to other WiFi mice I've used, this one seems a bit sluggish, and I'm not entirely satisfied with its performance. I’m considering returning but it’s such a hassle. For now only 3 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this for a week and can say I like it. Unusual design, but I’ve easily adapted to it. Not noisy, which is very important to me. Mouse shape appeared to be comfortable. Black color looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good value
reviews.reviewText: If you just need the basics productivity features it’s works well and does it’s job
